name: Quest Master's Realm: Land of the Phoenix
summary:
Dungeon Expansion for Quest Master's Realm.

Strange phenomena have been reported in the Orcazelos Desert , unexplained disturbances originating from below the surface.

Your job is to investigate, discover what is going on there.

Combat a new range of foes beneath the desert in the exciting Dungeon, 'The Solace of Q'ro'.

Mythical treasures await those who dare to venture here, a new range of equipment unavailable elsewhere in the game!
